alert.note: Alert for Burns BLM; Vale BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 28 at 7:13AM PDT until July 29 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TODAY AND SATURDAY... .Dry southwest flow aloft will continue through Saturday. As a result, gusty southwest winds with low relative humidity will redevelop this afternoon and evening near the Nevada border. Gusty winds will spread to Southeast Oregon and far Southwest Idaho on Saturday. The dry and gusty combination will result in periods of critical fire weather conditions. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR BURNS BLM AND VALE BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 636 AND 637... * WINDS...15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...6 to 12 percent. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
